Topic.Title: Changing the ‘help’ command while still retaining the basic function

Posts.EditableText:
**EDIT:** The problem was solved :)

Ok, so it’s all settled with the teleporter in my game, so I did a whole run through of the game. I’ve come to realise that it’s a little bit limited when it comes to the player rephrasing commands (i.e typing ‘in’ instead of ‘go into the house’ so I tried out the help button, which is good as it gives the player a bit more handling on the controls. This too, though, is limited, so I was wondering if it was possible to maybe change it slightly, or to take it even a step further, make it change depending on the situation you are currently in in the game.
